column4: i just want my resolution changed in netbook this sucks i'm going back to stupid windows
good luck, try it again in a few years. :-)

typically, either stuff just works, or you have a lot of digging to do before you figure out what's going on, and that's if you're a patient and computer-savvy person in the first place. If you're not, then you have no chance.
you are absolutely right that getting your correct screen solution should be 0-steps simple, though. If it's not working, it's a problem on our end 100%.
